aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.p1: Hi! I'm Alvaro Abba, a final year Architecture student. Throughout my training, I have developed a deep interest in sustainable design, the integration of architecture in the environment and the creation of spaces that connect with people.
aboutMe.p2: My experience includes academic projects and collaborations ranging from conceptualization to technical development, always with a focus on detail and functionality. I am passionate about the idea that architecture can transform lives and contribute to a more balanced and harmonious future.
